Name: Base Station Renewal, New Ampa Car & Limo, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of the application of New Ampa Car & Limo for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one. The application of New Ampa Car & Limo for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 1043 Coney Island Avenue, in the borough of Brooklyn, which application was approved by the taxi and limousine commission, is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 


LS#39
01/13/98
